Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Penitent's End
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Penitent's End to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Penitent's End to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These seem to be the former privy councilor's notes. From what's written, a Pilgrim's Sail carried him away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe you know this history better than I do... Here, you can have this book.
